strapiPost.title: Outpost In Rogers Acquires Electric Vehicles For Sale And Rent
strapiPost.content:
Thereâ€™s an exciting new line of electric vehicles at 2nd Street Outpost and Outfitters in Rogers. 

  • Electric rides: 2nd Street Outpost and Outfitters recently announced its order of boom!MOTO 100% electric eBicycles, eMotorcycles, eScooters, and an ATV that marks the beginning of a new approachable and sustainable way for anyone to see Northwest Arkansas via trails. 
  • Seeing the sites: The Outpost in Rogers has a rental program in the works that will allow customers to experience bikes without making a purchase. The retailer realizes that not everyone is able to hop on a traditional bike, so they created a solution that encourages people to experience the attractions of Downtown Rogers.

For more details, click HERE.
